mainSequence.step: Buyer/Client sends POST /faultManagementJob request to initiate the process
Fault Management Job is created by the system
Fault Management Job is set to 'inProgress' state
Data is generated by the system in the Fault Management Job
A Fault Management Report is automatically triggered
Fault Management Report is created by the system
Fault Management Report is in 'inProgress' state and collecting data
Fault Management Report is completed after data collection
